testcase.name: User Login Negative - Invalid E-mail
testcase.system-out: Given the user clicks on "Masuk"............................................passed When the user enters an invalid email address johnsmithbinar.com and a valid password QJblfja5Cso=.passed And the user clicks on "Login"..............................................passed Then the user is still on the login page....................................passed

testcase.name: User Login Negative - Invalid Password
testcase.system-out: When the user enters a valid email address QAE10_GR03_seller@binar.com and an invalid password P11S1FO2cCA=.passed And the user clicks on "Login"..............................................passed Then the user sees an "Invalid Email or password" message...................passed

testcase.name: User Login Negative - Empty Password
testcase.system-out: When the user enters a valid email address QAE10_GR03_buyer@binar.com and an empty password.passed And the user clicks on "Login"..............................................passed Then the user is still on the login page....................................passed

testcase.name: User Login Positive
testcase.system-out: When the user enters a valid email address QAE10_GR03_buyer@binar.com a valid password QJblfja5Cso=.passed And the user clicks on "Login"..............................................passed Then the user is redirected to the homepage.................................passed And the user clicks on "Profil Saya"........................................passed And the user's name John is displayed.......................................passed

testcase.name: User Logout Positive
testcase.system-out: Given the user navigates to the home page...................................passed When the user clicks on "Profil Saya".......................................passed And the user clicks on "Keluar".............................................passed Then the user is logged out and sees the "Masuk" link.......................passed
